title: Kanye West Has Been Missing for Days or Even Weeks
content: As rumors of his disappearance continue to circulate online, though, many are wondering if there is any truth to them, or whether they are just the latest hoax related to the rapper to come from the depths of the internet. Is Kanye West really missing? It seems like there is some credibility behind the claim that Kanye West is missing. According to reporting in the U.S. Sun, Kanye's former business manager Thomas St. John has had trouble finding him as he attempts to serve the rapper with a $4.5 million lawsuit. Thomas claimed that Kanye was missing in court in part so that he could be granted an extension to serve his lawsuit, which is over alleged unpaid fees.
